definitions.text: a long wooden bench with a back
settle into a position, usually on a surface or ground
examples: dust settled on the roofs

definitions.text: bring to an end; settle conclusively
examples: The case was decided
The judge decided the case in favor of the plaintiff
The father adjudicated when the sons were quarreling over their inheritance

definitions.text: settle conclusively; come to terms
examples: We finally settled the argument

definitions.text: take up residence and become established
examples: The immigrants settled in the Midwest

definitions.text: come to terms
examples: After some discussion we finally made up

definitions.text: go under,
examples: The raft sank and its occupants drowned

definitions.text: become settled or established and stable in one's residence or life style
examples: He finally settled down

definitions.text: become resolved, fixed, established, or quiet
examples: The roar settled to a thunder
The wind settled in the West
it is settling to rain
A cough settled in her chest
Her mood settled into lethargy

definitions.text: establish or develop as a residence
examples: He settled the farm 200 years ago
This land was settled by Germans

definitions.text: come to rest
arrange or fix in the desired order
examples: She settled the teacart

definitions.text: accept despite lack of complete satisfaction
examples: We settled for a lower price

definitions.text: end a legal dispute by arriving at a settlement
examples: The two parties finally settled

definitions.text: dispose of; make a financial settlement
become clear by the sinking of particles
examples: the liquid gradually settled

definitions.text: cause to become clear by forming a sediment (of liquids)
sink down or precipitate
examples: the mud subsides when the waters become calm

definitions.text: fix firmly
examples: He ensconced himself in the chair

definitions.text: get one's revenge for a wrong or an injury
examples: I finally settled with my old enemy

definitions.text: make final; put the last touches on; put into final form
examples: let's finalize the proposal

definitions.text: form a community
examples: The Swedes settled in Minnesota

definitions.text: come as if by falling
examples: Night fell
Silence fell
